comments:
Eclipse build number: 20040603
CDT build number: 200406030301

Test case:
1. Save your workspace in C:/Program Files (this is just to save the workpace 
such that it has space in its path)
2. Import a large project. I imported BubbleSort.

RESULT: If you open the Progress view, you will see the indexer doing its 
thing.

3. Now delete your project from the C/C++ Projects view.

RESULT: The indexer thread stalls and the following error appears in the log 
file:
